verses.verse: The <S%H5036>fool<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> "There is no <S%H430>God.<s%>" They are <S%H7843>corrupt,<s%> and have done <S%H8581>abominable<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity.<s%> There is no one who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> looks <S%H8259>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> on the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> if there <S%H3426>are<s%> any who <S%H7919>understood,<s%> who <S%H1875>seek<s%> after <S%H430>God.<s%>
Every one of them has gone <S%H5472>back.<s%> They have become <S%H444>filthy<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%> There is no one who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2896>good,<s%> <S%H259>no,<s%> not one.

Have the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> no <S%H3045>knowledge,<s%> who eat <S%H398>up<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> as they <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H7121>don't<s%> call on <S%H430>God?<s%>

There they were in <S%H6343>great<s%> <S%H6342>fear,<s%> where no <S%H6343>fear<s%> <S%H430>was,<s%> for God has <S%H6340>scattered<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of him who <S%H2583>encamps<s%> against <S%H954>you.<s%> You have put them to shame, because <S%H430>God<s%> has rejected <S%H3988>them.<s%>

Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> would come out of <S%H6726>Zion!<s%> When <S%H430>God<s%> brings <S%H7725>back<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> from <S%H7622>captivity,<s%> then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H1523>rejoice,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H8055>glad.<s%>
